text:
The House of Moneekrom had been handed down from one member of the Moneekrom family to the next. For over thousands of years, it had. And every time a new king was crowned, they added on a new wing to the alien castle, which was why I had to build it so enormous.
But over those thousands of years none of the Moneekrom kings or queens had been able to solve one big problem....
I needed to write all this down somewhere.
Just then, I heard keys jingling in the front door and Ma came slumping in from work. She eyed me while hanging up her coat. I knew then she was about to start in again. I tensed my shoulders and started rearranging blocks on one of the castle’s towers.
trans:
A Casa de Moneekrom havia sido passada de um membro da família Moneekrom para o outro ao longo de milhares de anos. E a cada novo rei coroado, uma ala nova era anexada ao castelo alienígena, o que justificava a necessidade de construir algo tão colossal.
Mas ao longo desses milhares de anos, nenhum dos reis ou rainhas de Moneekrom foi capaz de resolver um grande problema....
Eu precisava escrever tudo isso em algum lugar.
Foi então que ouvi o som das chaves na porta da frente e minha mãe entrou, exausta do trabalho. Ela me observou enquanto pendurava o casaco dela. Eu soube que ela estava prestes a começar a bronca. Tensionei os ombros e comecei a reorganizar os blocos na torre do castelo.
